title: [HOLD for payment 2023-11-07] [$500] WS - Members - List of users invited to the workspace does not scroll with Up and Down arrows
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com or open Desktop App
2. Login with Expensifail account
3. Create new or go to existing workspace
4. Go to Workspace > Members
5. Click Invite
6. Scroll user list with Up and Down Arrows on keyboard

Expected result: The user list is scrolled with Up and Down arrows

Actual result: None
